com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher
Class CoreDomainMatcher

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.DomainMatcher
      com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.CoreDomainMatcher

public class CoreDomainMatcher
extends DomainMatcher

Implements matching for the core domain types.

This class is typically extended by a matcher that wants to replace the core matcher by relaxing or strengthening the core matching rules. To relax the rules, one would typically add additional matchers to allow additional matches. To stengthen matching, one would typically introduce filters to eliminate some matches.

See Also:
LinkMatcher.registerAdditionalMatcher(LinkMatcher), LinkMatcher.registerMatchFilter(LinkMatchFilter)
